definition: to admire talented people/to value talent
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: And she did this because she loves him.
Love alone can work for man, and not against him.
sentences.chinese: 只有愛才能造福人類，而非危害人類。

sentences.english: Why am I loved only when I'm gone?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼只有死去，愛才將降臨於我身？

sentences.english: In the world because there are to love beauty.
Flew over the impermanence of the world, is the only Dongai treasures.
sentences.chinese: 飛過人間的無常，才懂愛才是寶藏。

sentences.english: Only love can win improbity , and it makes devil give up hatred and revenge.
sentences.chinese: 只有愛才能戰勝邪惡，令惡魔放下復仇的屠刀。

sentences.english: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitation of time.
sentences.chinese: 經受時間考驗的愛才是最珍貴的愛。

sentences.english: This world because of sincerity but amiability , because of having a love just complete.
sentences.chinese: 這個世界因真誠而可愛，因爲有愛才完整。

sentences.english: You as a person must be willing to fall, only then it can happen.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個人你必須願意掉進去，然後愛才會發生。

sentences.english: The emperor was also a wise monarch, cherish just and loved just.
sentences.chinese: 皇上也是賢明君主了，惜才，愛才。

sentences.english: Were acceptance is love can happens.
sentences.chinese: 當接受發生，愛才會發生。

sentences.english: Parliments cannot right the world, but enough people loving can.
sentences.chinese: 國會無法矯正這個世界，只有足夠的愛才能做到。

sentences.english: It is love that proves to be the ultimate healing grace.
sentences.chinese: 只有愛才是具有最終治救力量的恩澤。

sentences.english: Life is a journey and it is love that makes that journey worthwhile .
sentences.chinese: 生活是人生的一次旅程，只有愛才會讓它有意義。

definition: to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
lit. to like the new, and hate the old (idiom); fig. enamored with new people (e.g. new girlfriend), bored with the old
better to have nothing (than substandard choice) (idiom); would prefer to go without than accept shoddy option
to like to look good in the eyes of others/sensitive about how one is regarded by others/proud
to endure humiliation as part of an important mission (idiom); to suffer in silence
to cling to/to be reluctant to give up (sth)/to have a fondness for (an indulgence etc)
to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative
to argue/to reason with sb/to talk sense/to be reasonable
lit. love the house and its crow (idiom); involvement with sb and everyone connected/Love me, love my dog.
to do what one is told/obedient
